description: The Type-97 Fubuki is a Tactical Surface Fighter in use by Japanese forces as a training machine. Developed from the Type-94 Shiranui, the Fubuki uses many technologies from third-generation Japanese Tactical Surface Fighters, and has been noted to have performance on par with TSFs used for active combat.
name: 97 Shiki Senjutsu Hokou Koutou Renshuuki Fubuki
